org.integratedmodelling.thinklab.api.knowledge.query
Interface IQueriable

All Known Subinterfaces:
IKBox
public interface IQueriable

The interface implemented by any object that can be queried, such as a kbox, a textual search engine, etc.

Author:
Ferdinando Villa

Method Summary
 IQuery parseQuery(java.lang.String toEval)
          Return an IQuery that this kbox will like by parsing the given string.
 IQueryResult query(IQuery q)
          The simplest query operation just returns all results that match the query, with no metadata schema (meaning all metadata are retrieved) and no query boundaries.
 IQueryResult query(IQuery q, int offset, int maxResults)
          Submit the query and return results with specified offsets and max number of results.
 IQueryResult query(IQuery q, java.lang.String[] metadata, int offset, int maxResults)
          Submit the query with specified metadata and return results.
 

Method Detail

parseQuery

IQuery parseQuery(java.lang.String toEval)
                  throws ThinklabException
Return an IQuery that this kbox will like by parsing the given string. Most queriables have a preferred query type so it should be easy.

Parameters:
toEval -
Returns:
Throws:
ThinklabException

query

IQueryResult query(IQuery q)
                   throws ThinklabException
The simplest query operation just returns all results that match the query, with no metadata schema (meaning all metadata are retrieved) and no query boundaries.

Throws:
ThinklabException

query

IQueryResult query(IQuery q,
                   int offset,
                   int maxResults)
                   throws ThinklabException
Submit the query and return results with specified offsets and max number of results. All metadata will be included in the results.

Parameters:
q -
offset -
maxResults -
Returns:
Throws:
ThinklabException

query

                   java.lang.String[] metadata,
                   int offset,
                   int maxResults)
                   throws ThinklabException
Submit the query with specified metadata and return results.

Parameters:

metadata -
offset -
maxResults -
Returns:
Throws:
